abstract: Matlab scripts for the modification of HFR radial and total v2.1.2 datasets to comply v2.2 requirements.
description: These applications are written in Matlab language and they modify global attributes, variable attributes and variable content for complying to Copernicus-InSituTAC-FormatManual-1.42, Copernicus-InSituTAC-SRD-1.5, Copernicus-InSituTAC-ParametersList-3.2.1 requirements.

name: HFR_Node__ncPatch_v22
